item.description:
Drawing its musical influences from American roots music -- rhythm & blues, soul, Motown, boogie woogie and swing -- Eight to the Bar is known for its outstanding instrumentalists and sophisticated musical and vocal arrangements, highlighted by a female vocal trio. http://www.hamden.com...

This is the 3rd of the 4 free Summer concerts put on by Hamden Arts Commission each July and this will be a great evening out. We always have a great core group of members that show up to these events. This time let's see some new faces that have joined our group but who have not as yet been able to make it to any outings. I promise you, you will not be disappointed. Go on take the plunge!!! I can be texted/phoned @ (203) 927-2534
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the group sitting under the purple & yellow balloons

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Eight To The Bar Free Concert
